MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL35 postcode area of Aberdovey.  Whilst carrying out safety checks in the area ready for the planned work taking place tomorrow, our engineers have identified an immediate safety issue and It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm today. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:30pm. Please note that this does not replace the planned work taking place tomorrow, Wednesday 10th February. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:50pm on 9th February 2021.
